aequitas.fairflow.datasets.BankAccountFraud

class aequitas.fairflow.datasets.BankAccountFraud(variant: str, split_type: str = 'month', splits: dict[str, list[Any]] = {'test': (7,), 'train': (0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), 'validation': (6,)}, path: str | Path = PosixPath('/home/sergio.jesus/Documents/Projects/research/aequitas/src/aequitas/datasets/BankAccountFraud'), seed: int = 42, extension: str = 'parquet', target_feature: str | None = None, sensitive_feature: str | None = None)[source]
Attributes:
data

Return the dataset.

test

Return the test split of the dataset.

Return the training split of the dataset.

Methods

Create train, validation, and test splits for the dataset.
